unparsed_output:
**Average selected for Group E**

According to the document, the average value of the Group E sub-group is **65**. This value is obtained by averaging the caloric value of the fruit sub-group, wherein (because of relative popularity in serving frequencies) the potato value alone was weighted equally against the average value for all the other vegetables and the same was done in the case of the apple-banana-pear versus all the remaining fruit.
